text.headline: Freelance Web Developer
text.text: Web developments in PHP, Javascript (NodeJs, ReactJs), Python (Flask) and MySQL. Worked on Energy consumption dashboard for IoT around NTU campus and dashboard IoT control of virtual room.

text.headline: Autodesk Internship
text.text: Responsible for developing automation tools in python for auto capture screencast for tutorial videos for AutoCAD.

text.headline: Senior Software Engineer
text.text: Using PHP (Laravel), Javascript (NodeJs, ReactJs) and Python (Flask) for ERP, CRM, CMS and REST-API for backend of mobile applications.

text.headline: Tech Operation Engineer
text.text: Responsible for API (REST & FIX) integrations for customers, developing automation tools with Python, and crypto offline wallet managements.

text.headline: Tech Operation Support & Analyst
text.text: Responsible for customer operations and onboarding, developing dashboards to analyze exchange metrics, and contributing to the evaluation of stablecoin performance.

text.headline: Senior Data Analyst
text.text: Conducted comprehensive data analysis on customer risk ratings, stablecoin on-chain metrics, customer behavior, sentiment analysis, trading metrics, and regulatory reporting.
